data.name: Titan Souls Soundtrack & Special Edition Content
data.detailed_description: The Original Soundtrack by David Fenn as well as the Titan Souls digital artbook, world map, and desktop backgrounds. All files can be found in the soundtrack folder on your hard drive.
data.about_the_game: The Original Soundtrack by David Fenn as well as the Titan Souls digital artbook, world map, and desktop backgrounds. All files can be found in the soundtrack folder on your hard drive.
data.short_description: The Original Soundtrack by David Fenn as well as the Titan Souls digital artbook, world map, and desktop backgrounds.

Minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 750 MB available space
